text: "Even Better Than the Real Thing" is a 1992 song by Irish rock band U2. It is from their seventh studio album Achtung Baby. It went to number 2 in Portugal, number 3 in Canada and Ireland, number 6 in Italy, number 8 in Austria, the Netherlands and New Zealand, number 9 in Denmark, number 10 in Sweden, number 11 in Australia and number 12 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listings== ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:U2 songs Category:Alternative pop songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Psychedelic pop songs
title: Even Better Than the Real Thing
